bibl.title: Reusing Pottery in the Eastern Desert of Egypt.
"Pottery in the Archaeological Record: Greece and Beyond. Acts of the International Colloquium Held at the Danish and Canadian Institutes in Athens, June 20-22, 2008"

bibl.seg: Roberta Tomber, Reusing Pottery in the Eastern Desert of Egypt.

Mark L. Lawall & John Lund (edd.), Pottery in the Archaeological Record: Greece and Beyond. Acts of the International Colloquium Held at the Danish and Canadian Institutes in Athens, June 20-22, 2008 = Gösta Enbom Monographs. 1 (Aarhus, 2011) pp. 107-116, figg.
